keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: A mildly spiced Oriental dish. Serve with rice or egg noodles.

method.text: In a bowl, mix together the soy sauce, cider vinegar, five-spice, garlic and seasoning. Add the pork. Cover, and leave to marinate for 1 hour in a refrigerator.
Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan until sizzling. Add sweetcorn and broccoli. Stir-fry for 3-4 min or until tender.
Add the pork to the wok with any remaining marinade and stir-fry for 2-3 min. Add the mushrooms, bean sprouts and cashew nuts and stir-fry for a further 2 min. Serve immediately.

title: Chinese-style stir-fried pork
